resources.string: Calm down! XXX - You have already won :-)
A good shot, but too late :-((( The game is long over :-) OOO - I\'m a winner!
Game is over! OOO - I\'m a winner!
Don\'t sleep woodpecker. The game is already over! OOO - I\'m a winner!
Yes!!!! Unbelievably! This is a doublet. The game is over! XXX - You\'re a winner!!!
You are a greedy hamster! According to the rules of the game, you can not press several cells at once. Now you have to start all over again :-(\nWhat are you waiting for? Reload the app!
Hi! I\'m Mr.OOO. Let\'s start the game!
Wow! It\'s my doublet. From now on, whatever you do, it will still be OOO
Twist or do not twist, but the game is all the same over :-(
